label: 金剛般若波羅蜜経
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 55th  . Nara National Museum . 2003
見出し読み: こんごうはんにゃはらみつきょう
見出し読み_mod: こんごうはんにゃはらみつきょう
説明文: Vajracchedika Prajńāpāramitā-sūtra (Chinese, Jingang banruoboluomi jing) first translated into Chinese from Sanskrit by Kumārajīva (344-413). [Also Kongō kyō (金剛経）]
